CustomField.formula: CASE( Type__c , 'Temperature Sensitive', IMAGE('https://techproedu3-dev-ed--c.develop.vf.force.com/resource/1680362386000/TemperatureSensitiveContainer?', 'Temperature Sensitive Picture', 100, 120), 'General Purpose Picture', IMAGE('https://techproedu3-dev-ed--c.develop.vf.force.com/resource/1680439392000/GeneralPurposeContainer', 'General Purpose Picture', 100, 120) , 'Tank' ,IMAGE('https://techproedu3-dev-ed--c.develop.vf.force.com/resource/1680362486000/TankContainer?', 'Tank Picture Picture', 100, 120), null)
CustomField.label: ContainerImage
